title: T206 Stahl and Elberfeld Piedmont 350/460-42 PSA SOLD
author: rootsearcher60

posts.post_title: T206 Stahl and Elberfeld Piedmont 350/460-42 PSA SOLD
posts.post_content:
Last two Piedmont factory 42s for sale. 

Jake Stahl graded 2 (good). Nice color, but reverse miscut. Asking $sold OBO

Kid Elberfeld, graded 3 (very good). Staining on reverse. Asking $sold OBO

Ask questions about condition if needed. Did my best with the photos. 

Payment by Paypal. Price includes Priority Mail/Insurance.

SOLD in comments takes precedence over PMs.

Thank you.

Michael
